name: BRUTUS' WRECKER
description: The signature weapon of the perpetual champion of Crater Pit, until now. After being defeated in glorious mech combat this massive tungsten ball on a reinforced chain is now wielded by someone else. An ultimately primitive weapon it makes up for what it lacks in elegance with sheer brutality.

name: BRUTUS' SHIELD
effect: You may bring down this Shield as a Protocol to gain 2+Grit Overshield until the start of your next turn at which point you lose all Overshield. You are Slowed while you have this Overshield. You may not use this Protocol two turns in a row.
description: The signature weapon of the perpetual champion of Crater Pit, until now. After being defeated in glorious mech combat this relatively advanced slab shield is now wielded by someone else. Incorporating relatively advanced Harrison Armory technology this shield an project a localized force field of significant strength.

name: BLAST PICK
effect: Before making an attack, you may declare that you unload this weapon. If you do, the attack’s damage profile becomes 2d6+6 Explosive and it gains Knockback 2. Otherwise this weapon does not unload.
description: Originally used in IPS-N mining operations this particular pick eventually found its way to the Garfield’s of Port Conroy, a popular fusion pasta restaurant. Used as a prominent piece of decoration in the restaurant this aged mining implement yet packs some serious punch.

name: SHOCK BATON
on_crit: Target must perform a Systems save or become Jammed until the end of its next turn. On a success they become Impaired for the same duration. Each character can only be affected by this effect 1/Scene.
description: The IPS-N Shock Baton is a relatively recent development in the field of mech-to-mech “less lethal” weaponry. A popular choice for law enforcement seeking to disable frames instead of destroying them, allowing their pilots to be taken alive.

name: REAPER ASSAULT CANNON
effect: You may fire this weapon as if it were a Superheavy weapon. If you do, it gains Reliable 5 and its damage profile becomes 4d3+2 Kinetic instead.
description: IPS-N’s latest foray into the field of autocannons, the “Reaper” represents the middle ground between the regular Assault Cannon and the ubiquitous Leviathan. Able to lay down a harrowing hail of bullets, it lacks the typical assault cannon “spin up” feature, instead relying on yet more barrels and two rotary assemblies to achieve a superior rate of fire. Handed out to select IPS-N licensed printers, this latest model is still in the test stages.

name: Tempest Charged Blade
description: The latest innovations of GMS’ Type-II line of energy weapons have produced a Charged Blade of staggering proportions. It is currently carried in the “Storm” line of superheavy equipment.

name: Hurricane Cluster Projector
description: This oversized chassis mounted artillery platform is capable of unleashing a devastating barrage. Short ranged for a weapon of its kind it is nevertheless capable of saturating a targeted area in a harrowing hail of intelligent self-correcting cluster munitions. It is currently carried in the “Storm” line of superheavy equipment.
